content.rendered:
Cordless, Lighted Retractor

A Brighter Vision
for Patient Care

Tiger View is a single-use, cordless, lighted retractor designed for breast procedures. It delivers greater brightness than other retractors on the market, ensuring enhanced surgical visibility while remaining both efficient and cost-effective.

Tiger Aesthetics is now your one-stop trusted source for breast surgery products.

SKU Blade Length Blade Width
TVRT_13530 135mm 30mm
TVRT_13520 135mm 20mm
TVRT_9030 90mm 30mm
*Testing data on file

See what you have been missing with Tiger View™

Learn more about the comprehensive reconstruction portfolio from Tiger Aesthetics.

Contact a Representative
